amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 118-12 to amend Section 104 to include Parent's Right to Know if their child's school allows a person whose biological sex is male to use restrooms or changing rooms desginated for women or girls.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
